Question & Options:

A. Jared
B. Wanderer
C. Jeb
D. All of the above

What actions or promises are associated with Jared, Wanderer, and Doc in *The Host*?
Options:
A. Jared and Kyle move to kill Wanderer.
B. Wanderer makes Doc promise to let her die when removed.
C. Doc tries to save Wanderer from Jared.
D. Wanderer struggles with the pain of leaving her past lives behind.
Correct Answer: a) Jared and Kyle move to kill Wanderer. and b) Wanderer makes Doc promise to let her die when removed.
